mapper.insert: insert into tbl_dongnews_file (fileId, uuid, fileName, uploadPath, altText, insertYn, dnewsId) values (seq_dongnews_file.nextval, #{uuid}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{altText}, #{insertYn}, #{dnewsId})
mapper.select: select fileId, uuid, fileName, uploadPath, altText, insertYn, dnewsId from tbl_dongnews_file where fileId = #{fileId}
select fileId, uuid, fileName, uploadPath, altText, insertYn, dnewsId from tbl_dongnews_file where dnewsId = #{dnewsId} order by fileId
select count(*) from tbl_dongnews_file where dnewsId = #{dnewsId}
